name: Mi - PS4 Management App
author: Vonley
changelog: Server Management so its not always running in bg
Restart server under different port now possible without restarting

changes: Server Management so its not always running in bg
Restart server under different port now possible without restarting

changelogs.name: 1.0.0-rc
changes: Improved stability, final settings for ftp client, and ability to manually add consoles. can change default jb port but must force restart the app. Can select how you want to upload the payload.

changelogs.name: 1.0.0-beta
changes: Improved stability, included ftp for browsing, uploading and deleting files

changelogs.name: 1.0.0-alpha.1
changes: Added proguard rules for production build to fix minor error upon compilation. Delay payload execution from server side. Makes sending payload a bit more stable.
